name: Clay Shooter (Redline Games)
description: Clay shooter is a game with two modes.  In the first mode you take part in Redworth County Clay shooting competition against the computer for scores.  In the second part you have showdowns against several backdrops and opponents.  The windows installer is preferable to the html5 version but both are fully playable  The game has been in development for about 8 days of 20/03/2019.
